title: Personalized Instructional Design for Block-Based Programming Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of programming concepts and experience with block-based tools
context.additional_context: Focuses on block-based programming learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with a system providing real-time feedback tailored to individual learner progress.

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple logical structures of programming languages using block-based programming tools.
Learners can self-diagnose over 80% of barriers encountered during problem-solving processes through an AI-based personalized support system.
Learners can reduce logical errors in block assembly by over 50% through peer assessment and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
